snippet.title: Final Fantasy 4 Easy Type part 1
snippet.description: Since the PSP and the original SNES version have been done to death, I decided to do a playthrough of the Easy Type.  It's a re-release with some bugs and glitches that were fixed, although they still left two that I know in which you'll see in the first two parts.

localized.title: Final Fantasy 4 Easy Type part 1
localized.description: Since the PSP and the original SNES version have been done to death, I decided to do a playthrough of the Easy Type.  It's a re-release with some bugs and glitches that were fixed, although they still left two that I know in which you'll see in the first two parts.
